instruction: Create a Blueprint with a string array Inventory. On BeginPlay add Sword to the array and print the array length.
expected_dsl:

PARENT: Actor
VAR Inventory: Array<String>
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Inventory]
NODE n3: ArrayAdd [Item="Sword"]
NODE n4: ArrayLength
NODE n5: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
EXEC n3.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n4.Array [Array]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.InString [String]

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute

EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute

DATA n

instruction: Create a Blueprint with actor array Items. On BeginPlay get array length. If length greater than 0 print Has Items. Else print Empty.
expected_dsl:

PARENT: Actor
VAR Items: Array<Actor>
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Items]
NODE n3: ArrayLength
NODE n4: GreaterThan [B=0]
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Has Items"]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Empty"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.A [Int]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
EXEC n5.False -> n7.Execute

NODE n4: GreaterThan [B=0]
NODE n5: Branch

NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Empty"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Target [Array]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.A [Int]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
EXEC n5.False -> n7.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint with actor array Targets. On BeginPlay ForEachLoop checking distance. Track closest in variable Nearest. After loop print nearest name.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_FindNearest
PARENT: Actor
VAR Targets: Array<Actor>
VAR Nearest: Actor = None
VAR BestDist: Float = 999999.0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Targets]
NODE n3: ForEachLoop
NODE n4: GetDistanceTo
NODE n5: VariableGet [VarName=BestDist]
NODE n6: LessThan
NODE n7: Branch
NODE n8: VariableSet [VarName=BestDist]
NODE n9: VariableSet [VarName=Nearest]
NODE n10: VariableGet [VarName=Nearest]
NODE n11: GetDisplayName
NODE n12: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
EXEC n3.LoopBody -> n7.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n4.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n5.Value -> n6.B [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n7.True -> n8.Execute
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n8.Value [Float]
EXEC n8.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n9.Value [Actor]
EXEC n3.Completed -> n12.Execute
DATA n10.Value -> n11.Target [Actor]
DATA n11.ReturnValue -> n12.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_FindNearest
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
VAR Targets: Array = None
VAR Nearest: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Targets]
NODE n3: ForEachLoop
NODE n4: GetDistanceTo
NODE n5: LessThan [B=5000.0]
NODE n6: VariableSet [VarName=Nearest]
NODE n7: VariableGet [VarName=Nearest]
NODE n8: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
EXEC n3.LoopBody -> n6.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n4.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.A [Float]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.Value [Actor]
EXEC n6.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n7.Value -> n8.InString [String] }

EXEC n6.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n7.Value -> n8.InString [String] }

DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Max [Int]

instruction: Create a Blueprint with actor array TrackedActors. On overlap add actor. On end overlap remove actor from array. Print count after each change.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TrackOverlap
PARENT: Actor
VAR TrackedActors: Array<Actor>
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=TrackedActors]
NODE n3: ArrayAdd
NODE n4: ArrayLength
NODE n5: PrintString
NODE n6: Event_ActorEndOverlap
NODE n7: VariableGet [VarName=TrackedActors]
NODE n8: ArrayRemove
NODE n9: ArrayLength
NODE n10: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n3.Item [Actor]
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
EXEC n3.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n4.Array [Array]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.InString [String]
EXEC n6.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n6.OtherActor -> n8.Item [Actor]
DATA n7.Value -> n8.Array [Array]
EXEC n8.Then -> n10.Execute
DATA n7.Value -> n9.Array [Array]
DATA n9.ReturnValue -> n10.InString [String]

NODE n7: GetArraySize
NODE n8: PrintString
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n3.OtherActor -> n4.CollectionElement [Actor]
EXEC n4.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n8.InString [String] }
